name: AstraDroid Space Shooter
description:
AstraDroid Space Shooter is a passion project made to test our skills as a developement team. We thought, "How could we make Atari Asteroid but upgraded? "

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Shoot

Description:

Take flight in the space, dogfight against Asteroids, Enemy spaceships and TIME!! Collect powerups and items to reach your goal faster, and DO NOT DIE!!! The faith of The Crusader Colony is in your hand, Pathfinder!  

Note:

This is a small week based project we set to explore our skills with a new engine - all the features are not implemented; complete story, levels, powerups, and boss fights - so leave any feedback you have at our email: studiosoftworks.5@gmail.com or leave a comment/rating and if you like it, why not share with someone you think may enjoy it.

Thank you so much for checking out this mediocre attempt at re-branding the classic Atari Asteroid game, we hope you had fun playing - ssoftworks

Additional Note:

We have commandeer some identified bugs with the game and made fixes to some features, specifically the audio and minor updates and bug fixes.

Please continue to share your feedback with us, if you have identified any bugs, have any suggestions or just want to say hello. Thank you for being amazing people.
